        mat1 - left hand AxB matrix
        mat2 - right hand BxC matrix
        Returns:
        AxC matrix

      • extModMat

        public float[][] extModMat(float[][] mat,
                           float mod)
        After a modulo, makes all values the positive modulo When using a modulo on a float value, a negative number can be returned
        Parameters:
        mat - matrix to be operated on
        mod - mod value
        Returns:
        matrix with all positive mod values
